title: Engineering Education Design Workshop Utilizing Hybrid Lecture Formats

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in engineering fundamentals and practical experience, basic project management competencies
context.additional_context: Weekend-intensive training for employees, combining online videos with offline projects.

learning_goals: Learners can establish self-directed learning plans while watching 80%+ of online videos in a hybrid lecture model
Learners can complete one or more engineering problem-solving projects through collaboration with peers in a PBL environment
Learners can demonstrate metacognition by adjusting learning strategies based on difficulty analysis of video content
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
